ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Sean Gifford <giffords@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, July 12, 1999 3:46 PM
Subject: [eqbards] AHA!


>From: "Sean Gifford" <giffords@...>
>
>Reading the 76 or so messages in my mailbox, (after one day on onelist) I
>have discovered the main reason for my near encumberance A minotaur axe,
>and a Shiney Brass sheild add up to about 18 weight if I remember
correctly.
>replacing the axe with a dirk should easily help me out, thank you for
>everyone's help. But is there a good light weight 1H slash weapon I could
>afford (around 50plat on me), I would still like to level 1H slash.
>


A dwarven axe is 1hs, weighs 4.0 and does 6/26. I got my first one
for 8pp hanging out at CB waiting for a dirk to show.
